name: 郭政淳
objective: 本課程提供學生及職前專業人士必備之英語文語言技巧，強調工程專業領域之英文溝通能力之訓練。課程內容依學院專業內容區分並整合英語文之聽說讀寫之能力為未來全球化移動及以英語專業溝通人才培育為目標。
schedule:
Week1    Orientation
Week2    Energy Sources
Week3    Energy Sources
Week4    Environmental Problems
Week5    Environmental Problems
Week6    Writing Emails (I)   
Week7    English Presentation Skills (I)
Week8    3 Minute thesis (practice)
Week9    Midterm Exam-No Class
Week10   Sensors & Digital Image Fundamentals
Week11   Sensors & Digital Image Fundamentals
Week12   Presenting Visual Aids (I): Introducing Graphs 
Week13   Presenting Visual Aids (II): Describing Moves and Trends 
Week14   Explaining Visual Aids in Writing
Week15   English Presentation Skills (II)
Week16   3 Minute thesis (formal)
Week17   Writing Emails (II)
Week18   Future Technology
scorePolicy:
Attendance: 10%
Quizzes & Exercises: 30% 
Homework: 20%
Midterm Exam: 20%
3 MT Presentation: 20%
materials: ESP Series (北科之英) for College of Engineering. Book 1&2. Department of English, NTUT.
